settings.giftWrapTooltipContent:
Gift wrap - $[PRICE] per item
You can gift wrap most items. If you buy multiple quantities of the same item, you'll be charged just $[PRICE] to have them all wrapped together.

Please note: not all items are eligible for gift wrap. Gift wrap styles and colors are limited and change frequently. Styles may include gift boxes or bags, depending on the item size.
